20110120190007.000|20110120190008.000|CC1|WITH A HOMICIDE IN MIAMI.       
20110120190008.000|20110120190011.000|CC1|WHEN THEY GOT THERE, A MAN WAS  
20110120190011.000|20110120190012.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20110120190012.000|20110120190013.000|CC1|THERE WAS A CONFRONTATION.      
20110120190013.000|20110120190015.000|CC1|ONE OFFICER WAS SHOT ONE TIME   
20110120190015.000|20110120190017.000|CC1|AND DIED ON THE SCENE.          
20110120190017.000|20110120190019.000|CC1|A MALE OFFICER DIED AT THE      
20110120190019.000|20110120190019.000|CC1|SCENE.                          
20110120190019.000|20110120190021.000|CC1|A SECOND OFFICER, A FEMALE WAS  
20110120190021.000|20110120190023.000|CC1|SHOT MULTIPLE TIMES.            
20110120190023.000|20110120190025.000|CC1|SHE WAS RUSHED TO A TRAUMA      
20110120190025.000|20110120190027.000|CC1|CENTER AND RIGHT INTO SURGERY,  
20110120190027.000|20110120190029.000|CC1|BUT WE WERE TOLD BY A TEARFUL   
20110120190029.000|20110120190032.000|CC1|COUNTY MAR YOR THAT SHE DIED ON 
20110120190032.000|20110120190033.000|CC1|THE OPERATING TABLE.            
20110120190033.000|20110120190035.000|CC1|A THIRD OFFICER SUFFERED MINOR  
20110120190035.000|20110120190036.000|CC1|INJURIES AND IS EXPECTED TO     
20110120190036.000|20110120190037.000|CC1|SURVIVE THEM.                   
20110120190037.000|20110120190039.000|CC1|AND THE SUSPECT, WE'RE ALSO TOLD
20110120190039.000|20110120190042.000|CC1|WAS SHOT AND KILLED AT THE      
20110120190042.000|20110120190043.000|CC1|SCENE.                          
20110120190043.000|20110120190044.000|CC1|THREE PEOPLE SHOT AND KILLED.   
20110120190044.000|20110120190046.000|CC1|TWO OFFICERS, ONE SUSPECT.      
20110120190046.000|20110120190047.000|CC1|'S OFFICER INJURIED.            
20110120190047.000|20110120190048.000|CC1|THE SCENE AT THE HOSPITAL WAS

20110120190051.000|20110120190052.000|CC1|OTHER OFFICERS RUSHED TO THE    
20110120190052.000|20110120190053.000|CC1|SCENE.

20110120190054.000|20110120190056.000|CC1|SCENE WAS VERY TEARFUL.

20110120190801.000|20110120190804.000|CC1|>> THE CASE OF A MISSING NORTH
